文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk1
证据片段: Fabrication of Zircaloy reactor components results in a marked preferred crystallographic orientation

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk1
证据片段: tubing was in the stress-relieved condition, pressurized water reactor (PWR) type, with $1 0 . 9 2 \mathrm { - m m }$ diameter and $0 . 6 3 5 { \cdot } \mathrm { m m }$ wall thickness

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk1
证据片段: Round-robin participants were instructed to perform texture analysis at the mid-wall using their standard texture technique

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk1
证据片段: all participants chose X-ray diffraction as their analytical tool

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: Seven participants prepared the radial-direction specimen to a mid-wall thickness by the method devised by Tenckhoff and Rittenhouse [14]. Using their method, the tubing wall is first thinned by machining, chemically thinned to the final thickness, cut to size, and flattened elastically.
工艺步骤: machining, chemical thinning, cutting, elastic flattening

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: Other laboratories cut narrow axial sections and secured them adjacent to each other on a platen.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: Composite specimens for the longitudinal and tangential directions were prepared by stacking sections of tubing together.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: A: Full 40, Partial •.•, Inverse 40

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: M: Full •••, Partial 5, Inverse 5

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: Three laboratories (B, C, M) performed back-reflection partial direct pole figure [14] analyses using only the radial-direction specimens.
测试类型: back-reflection partial direct pole figure analysis

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: Laboratories K and J also used only the radial-direction specimen, but coupled the reflection and transmission methods [15] to achieve a complete pole figure.

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk2
证据片段: All remaining laboratories used the reflection [16] method utilizing three orthogonal specimens representing the radial, longitudinal, and tangential directions of the tube.

证据片段: The procedure results in a $0 . 1 \mathrm { - m m }$ -thick specimen whose exposed surface is ${ \le } 0 . 0 5 \ \mathrm { m m }$ from the midplane of the original tubing.

证据片段: For transmission specimens the surface area should be somewhat larger and the specimen thinned to ${ < } 0 . 1 \ \mathrm { m m }$ .

证据片段: Counting times varied from 1 s per data point (Laboratory B) to $\bf { 2 0 ~ s }$ per data point (Laboratory C).

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk5
证据片段: Holt and Wingar [17] illustrated that the loss of diffracted intensity with specimen inclination (the defocus condition) is caused by the increase in the diffraction beam peak width with increasing inclination, and that this increase is greater for a sharp peak (annealed material) than for a broad one (cold-worked material).

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_006_chunk5
证据片段: Holt and Wingar [17] illustrated that the loss of diffracted intensity with specimen inclination (the defocus condition) is caused by the increase in the diffraction beam peak width with increasing inclination, and that this increase is greater for a sharp peak (annealed material) than for a broad one (cold-worked material).
